verbose_text: They determined that the unique excitability of immature neurons was responsible for LTP induced without GABAergic inhibition because, either blocking the NR2B subunit of the NMDA receptor (expressed highly during development) or using irradiation to block neurogenesis, prevented the expression of LTP.
evidence: LTP induced without GABAergic inhibition because, either blocking the NR2B subunit of the NMDA receptor
